(Simplified: 癞)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 賴 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 賴 [ lài ] to depend on, to rely on; to bilk, to deny; poor
①麻風病。
②癬疥等皮膚病：癩子。癩皮狗(喻不要臉的人)。
③表皮凸凹不平或有斑點的：癩瓜(即“苦瓜”)。癩蛤蟆。
癩蛤蟆 [ lài há ma ]: toad
癩蛤蟆想吃天鵝肉 [ lài há ma xiǎng chī tiān é ròu ]: lit. the toad wants to eat swan meat (idiom); fig. to try to punch above one's weight
癩皮病 [ lài pí bìng ]: pellagra; scabies
(Simplified: 癞)

Liushutong characters (3)

癩字的基本解释

癩
lài
见“癞”。

癩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《廣韻》落蓋切，去泰，來。］
［《廣韻》盧達切，入曷，來。］
“癞1”的繁体字。
(1)恶疮；顽癣；麻风。
(2)像生了癞疮的。谓表面凹凸不平或毛皮脱落。参见“癩瓜”、“癩蝦蟆”。
(3)差，劣。参见“癩活”。

癩字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癩； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页782第41
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?落蓋切，音賴。【說文】惡疾也。【論語】伯牛有疾。【註】先儒以爲癩也。本作癘。　又【廣韻】盧達切【集韻】郎達切，?音辣。與瘌同。

skin disease

skin disease

See "Leprosy".
skin disease
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Guangyun" Go to Thailand, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Daqie, enter, come. ]
"癞1" in traditional characters.
(1) Malignant sores; stubborn ringworm; leprosy.
(2) It looks like a skin sore. It is said that the surface is uneven or the fur is falling off. See "spot melon", "shrimp moth".
(3) Poor, inferior. See "Lesser".
skin disease
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　癞; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 782, 41
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Luo Gaiqie, sound Lai. [Said the text] Vicious illness too. [The Analects] Bo Niu is ill. [Note] The first Confucian thought it was a leper. This is a boil.　[Guangyun] Lu Daqie [Jiyun] Lang Daqie, the sound is spicy. Same as 瘌.
